name: Between the Eyes
description:
Finishing move that deals damage with your pistol, increasing your critical strike chance against the target by 20%.
   1 point : 76 damage, 3 sec
   2 points: 152 damage, 6 sec
   3 points: 228 damage, 9 sec
   4 points: 305 damage, 12 sec
   5 points: 381 damage, 15 sec
